originContent: CORE‚Äôs ingestion pipeline has four phases designed to capture evolving context:
translatedContent: Quy tr√¨nh n·∫°p d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa CORE c√≥ b·ªën giai ƒëo·∫°n ƒë∆∞·ª£c thi·∫øt k·∫ø ƒë·ªÉ thu th·∫≠p ng·ªØ c·∫£nh thay ƒë·ªïi:

originContent: 1. **Normalization**: Links new information to recent context, breaks long documents into coherent chunks while keeping cross-references, and standardizes terms so by the time CORE extracts knowledge, it‚Äôs working with clean, contextualized input instead of messy text.
translatedContent: 1. **Chu·∫©n h√≥a**: Li√™n k·∫øt th√¥ng tin m·ªõi v·ªõi ng·ªØ c·∫£nh g·∫ßn ƒë√¢y, chia t√†i li·ªáu d√†i th√†nh c√°c ƒëo·∫°n m·∫°ch l·∫°c ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi gi·ªØ c√°c tham chi·∫øu ch√©o, v√† chu·∫©n h√≥a thu·∫≠t ng·ªØ ƒë·ªÉ khi CORE tr√≠ch xu·∫•t tri th·ª©c, n√≥ ƒëang l√†m vi·ªác v·ªõi ƒë·∫ßu v√†o s·∫°ch, c√≥ ng·ªØ c·∫£nh thay v√¨ vƒÉn b·∫£n l·ªôn x·ªôn.

originContent: 2. **Extraction**: Pulls meaning from normalized text by identifying entities (people, tools, projects, concepts), turning them into statements with context, source, and time, and mapping relationships. For example, ‚ÄúWe wrote CORE in Next.js‚Äù becomes: Entities (Core, Next.js), Statement (CORE was developed using Next.js), and Relationship (was developed using).
translatedContent: 2. **Tr√≠ch xu·∫•t**: R√∫t ra √Ω nghƒ©a t·ª´ vƒÉn b·∫£n ƒë√£ chu·∫©n h√≥a b·∫±ng c√°ch nh·∫≠n di·ªán th·ª±c th·ªÉ (con ng∆∞·ªùi, c√¥ng c·ª•, d·ª± √°n, kh√°i ni·ªám), chuy·ªÉn th√†nh ph√°t bi·ªÉu v·ªõi ng·ªØ c·∫£nh, ngu·ªìn v√† th·ªùi gian, v√† l·∫≠p b·∫£n ƒë·ªì quan h·ªá. V√≠ d·ª•, ‚ÄúCh√∫ng t√¥i vi·∫øt CORE b·∫±ng Next.js‚Äù th√†nh: Th·ª±c th·ªÉ (Core, Next.js), Ph√°t bi·ªÉu (CORE ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn b·∫±ng Next.js), v√† Quan h·ªá (ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn b·∫±ng).

originContent: 3. **Resolution**: Detects contradictions, tracks how preferences evolve, and preserves multiple perspectives with provenance instead of overwriting them so memory reflects your full journey, not just the latest snapshot.
translatedContent: 3. **Gi·∫£i quy·∫øt**: Ph√°t hi·ªán m√¢u thu·∫´n, theo d√µi s·ª± thay ƒë·ªïi c·ªßa s·ªü th√≠ch, v√† b·∫£o to√†n nhi·ªÅu g√≥c nh√¨n v·ªõi ngu·ªìn g·ªëc thay v√¨ ghi ƒë√®, ƒë·ªÉ b·ªô nh·ªõ ph·∫£n √°nh to√†n b·ªô h√†nh tr√¨nh c·ªßa b·∫°n ch·ª© kh√¥ng ch·ªâ kho·∫£nh kh·∫Øc m·ªõi nh·∫•t.

originContent: 4. **Graph Integration**: Connects entities, statements, and episodes into a temporal knowledge graph that links facts to their context and history, turning isolated data into a living web of knowledge agents can actually use.
translatedContent: 4. **T√≠ch h·ª£p ƒë·ªì th·ªã**: K·∫øt n·ªëi th·ª±c th·ªÉ, ph√°t bi·ªÉu, v√† t·∫≠p di·ªÖn ra th√†nh m·ªôt ƒë·ªì th·ªã tri th·ª©c theo th·ªùi gian li√™n k·∫øt s·ª± ki·ªán v·ªõi ng·ªØ c·∫£nh v√† l·ªãch s·ª≠, bi·∫øn d·ªØ li·ªáu r·ªùi r·∫°c th√†nh m·∫°ng tri th·ª©c s·ªëng m√† c√°c agent c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng.

originContent: The Result: Instead of a flat database, CORE gives you a memory that grows and changes with you - preserving context, evolution, and ownership so agents can actually use it.
translatedContent: K·∫øt qu·∫£: Thay v√¨ m·ªôt c∆° s·ªü d·ªØ li·ªáu ph·∫≥ng, CORE cung c·∫•p cho b·∫°n b·ªô nh·ªõ ph√°t tri·ªÉn v√† thay ƒë·ªïi c√πng b·∫°n - b·∫£o to√†n ng·ªØ c·∫£nh, ti·∫øn h√≥a v√† quy·ªÅn s·ªü h·ªØu ƒë·ªÉ c√°c agent th·ª±c s·ª± s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c.
## C√°ch CORE truy xu·∫•t t·ª´ b·ªô nh·ªõ

originContent: When you ask CORE a question, it doesn‚Äôt just look up text - it digs into your whole knowledge graph to find the most useful answers.
translatedContent: Khi b·∫°n h·ªèi CORE m·ªôt c√¢u, n√≥ kh√¥ng ch·ªâ tra c·ª©u vƒÉn b·∫£n - n√≥ ƒë√†o s√¢u v√†o to√†n b·ªô ƒë·ªì th·ªã tri th·ª©c ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m c√¢u tr·∫£ l·ªùi h·ªØu √≠ch nh·∫•t.

originContent: 1. **Search**: CORE looks through memory from multiple angles at once - keyword search for exact matches, semantic search for related ideas even if phrased differently, and graph traversal to follow links between connected concepts.
translatedContent: 1. **T√¨m ki·∫øm**: CORE qu√©t b·ªô nh·ªõ t·ª´ nhi·ªÅu g√≥c c√πng l√∫c - t√¨m ki·∫øm theo t·ª´ kh√≥a cho c√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ ch√≠nh x√°c, t√¨m ki·∫øm ng·ªØ nghƒ©a cho √Ω li√™n quan d√π di·ªÖn ƒë·∫°t kh√°c, v√† duy·ªát ƒë·ªì th·ªã ƒë·ªÉ ƒëi theo c√°c li√™n k·∫øt gi·ªØa kh√°i ni·ªám.

originContent: 2. **Re-Rank**: The retrieved results are reordered to highlight the most relevant and diverse ones, ensuring you don‚Äôt just see obvious matches but also deeper connections.
translatedContent: 2. **X·∫øp h·∫°ng l·∫°i**: C√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ truy xu·∫•t ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·∫Øp x·∫øp l·∫°i ƒë·ªÉ l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t c√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ li√™n quan nh·∫•t v√† ƒëa d·∫°ng nh·∫•t, ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o b·∫°n kh√¥ng ch·ªâ th·∫•y c√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ r√µ r√†ng m√† c√≤n c·∫£ c√°c k·∫øt n·ªëi s√¢u h∆°n.

originContent: 3. **Filtering**: CORE applies smart filters based on time, reliability, and relationship strength, so only the most meaningful knowledge surfaces.

originContent: 4. **Output**: You get back both facts (clear statements) and episodes (the original context they came from), so recall is always grounded in context, time, and story.
